song.title: My Place in Space (rmx)
song.info:
My place in space
Funky acid reinvention mix Mix by Chuck Biscuits/kfmf
Original by Mental Floss
Quick thanx to everyone who has given me help recently, i'm indebted to all of you.
Samps.from all over the place including a couple of those little tasty choccy boxes from roland, a few phat slabs of vinyl, a guy named ray and mental floss via maelcum's vcr ::
Thoughts: wow, finally some passable tb emulation in my tracks <yay!>
This mindmeld is copyright 1995 mentalfloss and 1996 ChuckBiscuits, both of the Kosmic free music foundation ::
Off i go again to my nice place in space ../=''*
